CoolingTower.description: This is the schema definition for the CoolingTower Metrics.
CoolingTower.longDescription: This resource shall be used to represent a cooling metrics resource for a Redfish implementation.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Actions.description: The available actions for this resource.
Actions.longDescription: The Actions property shall contain the available actions for this resource.

AlarmResetPoweredOn.description: The actual Alarm Reset Status of CoolingTower.
AlarmResetPoweredOn.longDescription: The value of this property shall represent the actual Alarm Reset Powered On boolean value of CoolingTower.

AssetTag.description: The actual Asset Tag of CoolingTower.
AssetTag.longDescription: The value of this property shall represent the actual Asset Tag of CoolingTower.

ColdWaterFlowSetPoint.description: The actual Cold Water Flow Set Point of CoolingTower.
ColdWaterFlowSetPoint.longDescription: The value of this property shall represent the actual Cold Water Flow Set Point of CoolingTower.

ColdWaterValveFailCloseAlarmOn.description: The actual Cold Water Valve Fail Close Alarm Status of CoolingTower.
ColdWaterValveFailCloseAlarmOn.longDescription: The value of this property shall represent the actual Cold Water Valve Fail to Close Alarm On boolean value of CoolingTower.

ColdWaterValveFailOpenAlarmOn.description: The actual Cold Water Valve Fail Open Alarm Status of CoolingTower.
ColdWaterValveFailOpenAlarmOn.longDescription: The value of this property shall represent the actual Cold Water Valve Fail to Open Alarm On boolean value of CoolingTower.

CoolingTowerAvailable.longDescription: The value of this property shall represent the actual Availability of CoolingTower.

CoolingTowerEnabled.description: The actual Enable/Disable status of CoolingTower.
CoolingTowerEnabled.longDescription: The value of this property shall represent the actual Enable/Disable status of CoolingTower.

CoolingWaterValveFailCloseAlarmOn.description: The actual Cooling Water Valve Fail Close Alarm Status of CoolingTower.
CoolingWaterValveFailCloseAlarmOn.longDescription: The value of this property shall represent the actual Cooling Water Valve Fail to Close Alarm On boolean value of CoolingTower.

CoolingWaterValveFailOpenAlarmOn.description: The actual Cooling Water Valve Fail Open Alarm Status of CoolingTower.
CoolingWaterValveFailOpenAlarmOn.longDescription: The value of this property shall represent the actual Cooling Water Valve Fail to Open Alarm On boolean value of CoolingTower.

DateOfManufacture.description: The date of manufacture of CoolingTower.
DateOfManufacture.longDescription: The value of this property shall represent the actual date of manufacture of CoolingTower.

DrainValveProof.description: The actual Drain Valve Proof value of CoolingTower.
DrainValveProof.longDescription: The value of this property shall represent the actual Test for Drain Valve value of CoolingTower.

FanFailureToRunAlarmOn.description: The actual Fan Failure to Run Status of CoolingTower.
FanFailureToRunAlarmOn.longDescription: The value of this property shall represent the actual Fan Failure to Run Alarm On boolean value of CoolingTower.

FanFaultAlarmOn.description: The actual Fan Fault Alarm Status of CoolingTower.
FanFaultAlarmOn.longDescription: The value of this property shall represent the actual Fan Fault Alarm On boolean value of CoolingTower.

FanHighSpeedAlarmOn.description: The actual Fan High Speed Alarm Status of CoolingTower.
FanHighSpeedAlarmOn.longDescription: The value of this property shall represent the actual High Speed Run Failure Alarm On boolean value of CoolingTower.

FanHighSpeedSetting.description: The actual Fan High Speed Setting percentage value of CoolingTower.
FanHighSpeedSetting.longDescription: The value of this property shall represent the actual Fan High Speed Setting percentage value of CoolingTower.

FanLowSpeedAlarmOn.description: The actual Fan Low Speed Alarm Status of CoolingTower.
FanLowSpeedAlarmOn.longDescription: The value of this property shall represent the actual Low Speed Run Failure Alarm On boolean value of CoolingTower.

FanLowSpeedSetting.description: The actual Fan Low Speed Setting percentage value of CoolingTower.
FanLowSpeedSetting.longDescription: The value of this property shall represent the actual Fan Low Speed Setting percentage value of CoolingTower.

FanPoweredOn.description: The actual Fan Status of CoolingTower.
FanPoweredOn.longDescription: The value of this property shall represent the actual Fan Powered On boolean value of CoolingTower.

FanStarted.description: The actual Fan Started status of CoolingTower.
FanStarted.longDescription: The value of this property shall represent the actual Fan Started status of CoolingTower.

FanVFDModulation.description: The actual Fan VFD Modulation percentage value of CoolingTower.
FanVFDModulation.longDescription: The value of this property shall represent the actual Direct Control of Fan percentage value of CoolingTower.

FirmwareRevision.description: The actual Firmware Revision of CoolingTower.
FirmwareRevision.longDescription: The value of this property shall represent the actual Firmware Revision of CoolingTower.

HardwareRevision.description: The actual Hardware Revision of CoolingTower.
HardwareRevision.longDescription: The value of this property shall represent the actual Hardware Revision of CoolingTower.

HighFanSpeedStatus.description: The actual High Fan Speed status of CoolingTower.
HighFanSpeedStatus.longDescription: The value of this property shall represent the actual High Fan Speed status (boolean value; true for OFF/false for ON) of CoolingTower.

LeadLagPosition.description: The actual Lead/Lag Position of CoolingTower.
LeadLagPosition.longDescription: The value of this property shall represent the actual Lead/Lag Position of CoolingTower.

LowFanGearOilLevelAlarmOn.description: The actual Low Fan Gear Oil Level Alarm Status of CoolingTower.
LowFanGearOilLevelAlarmOn.longDescription: The value of this property shall represent the actual Low Fan Gear Oil Level Alarm On boolean value of CoolingTower.

LowFanSpeedStatus.description: The actual Low Fan Speed status of CoolingTower.
LowFanSpeedStatus.longDescription: The value of this property shall represent the actual Low Fan Speed status (boolean value; true for OFF/false for ON) of CoolingTower.

Manufacturer.longDescription: The value of this property shall represent the actual Manufacturer of CoolingTower.

Model.description: The actual Model Number of CoolingTower.
Model.longDescription: The value of this property shall represent the actual Model Number of CoolingTower.

Oem.description: This is the manufacturer/provider specific extension moniker used to divide the Oem object into sections.
Oem.longDescription: The value of this string shall be of the format for the reserved word *Oem*.

OperatingLevelSwitch.description: The actual Operating Level Switch of CoolingTower.

OverrideConditionLeadLagPosition.description: The actual Lead/Lag Position value of CoolingTower.
OverrideConditionLeadLagPosition.longDescription: The value of this property shall represent the actual Override Condition Lead/Lag value of CoolingTower.

PartNumber.description: The actual Part Number of CoolingTower.
PartNumber.longDescription: The value of this property shall represent the actual Part Number of CoolingTower.

PhysicalLocation.description: The actual Physical Location of CoolingTower.
PhysicalLocation.longDescription: The value of this property shall represent the actual Physical Location of CoolingTower.

RequestSignal.description: The actual Request Signal status of CoolingTower.
RequestSignal.longDescription: The value of this property shall represent the Request Signal to Run Detected (binary value) of CoolingTower.

Sensors.description: Contains the members of this collection.

SerialNumber.description: The actual Serial Number of CoolingTower.
SerialNumber.longDescription: The value of this property shall represent the actual Serial Number of CoolingTower.

SumpTankHighLevelAlarmOn.description: The actual Sump Tank High Level Alarm Status of CoolingTower.
SumpTankHighLevelAlarmOn.longDescription: The value of this property shall represent the actual Sump Level Reaching High Value Alarm On boolean value of CoolingTower.

SumpTankLowLevelAlarmOn.description: The actual Sump Tank Low Level Alarm Status of CoolingTower.
SumpTankLowLevelAlarmOn.longDescription: The value of this property shall represent the actual Sump Level Reaching Low Value Alarm On boolean value of CoolingTower.

UnitPoweredOn.description: The actual Unit Status of CoolingTower.
UnitPoweredOn.longDescription: The value of this property shall represent the actual Unit Powered On boolean value of CoolingTower.

VibrationSwitchAlarmOn.description: The actual Vibration Switch Alarm Status of CoolingTower.
VibrationSwitchAlarmOn.longDescription: The value of this property shall represent the actual Fan Motor Vibration Switch Alarm On boolean value of CoolingTower.

VibrationSwitchSetPoint.description: The actual Vibration Switch Set Point of CoolingTower.
VibrationSwitchSetPoint.longDescription: The value of this property shall represent the actual Fan Motor Vibration Switch Set Point in g of CoolingTower.
